programme.title: Promise Chronicles: Manifestation
programme.desc: A despairing group of Christians and non-believer's band together during the biblical period, known as Tribulation, not only to survive death, but to escape America, and uncover a sinister globalist plot designed by an overreaching government.

programme.title: Twerk: Reggae Nights
programme.desc: Hard-working, single mother, Iesha, learns that one of the most popular reggae artists, Domino, is holding an audition in her city for dancers in his next music video. The competition is fierce, and some of the ladies will do anything to get the job.

programme.title: Blinded Shot
programme.desc: Memphis slacker Courtney clashes with his tough-love parents who want him to grow up. Secretly, Courtney leads a notorious robbery crew targeting the city's elite. One mistake sparks chaos, forcing Courtney to confront his successful lawyer brother Jarvis, their strained relationship, and a dark family secret that brings deadly consequences.

programme.title: Battered Emotions
programme.desc: Rasheada has accepted that her battle with breast cancer is inevitable but her spiritual fight is still as strong as ever. She continues her upbeat facade for friends and family, but is unsure how long it will be until she can no longer compete with her emotional life's journey. Her sister, Tara, and her best friend, Bunny, struggle with their own issues of inner demons and domestic violence, while trying to support Rasheada through her battle.

programme.title: Battered Emotions 2
programme.desc: Follows the story of Bunny Taylor, when her life takes another unfortunate turn following the death of her best friend Rasheeda, along with getting back with her abusive boyfriend Darius. Bunny finds out she’s pregnant, and Darius claims the baby is not his. Fearing for her and her child’s life, Bunny decides to leave, but leaving will not be an easy journey for her.

programme.title: Dangerous Feelings
programme.desc: Zaria Combs is a happily married woman of 8 years, until Keith, an old flame from her past resurfaces into her life, and at a time when she has been feeling neglected and lonely from her husband Jazper. Keith is released from prison and is determined to win back Zaria and find out who set him up. The two reconnect, and begin to blackmail Jazper. Will there feelings start a new life? Or lead them to road of destruction?

programme.title: Designer
programme.desc: Dre has aspirations of making it big in the cannabis industry, but when his perceived star plant dies, his hopes and dreams start to fade. He finds himself and his 2 buddies embark on a wild adventure with their sights set on the components to make the strain of all strains of cannabis.

programme.title: Devil's Kiss
programme.desc: Jaz and Taz are more than just sisters, they are two street assassins with a taste for money, respect and blood. After killing the brother of a local kingpin, Jaz and Taz find themselves on the run leaving a trail of drugs and betrayal.

programme.title: Fall Semester
programme.desc: Kid Kypree is a college student with dreams and ambitions of becoming the next great stand-up comic. One night he gets invited to a party hosted by his old friend Bo that thrusts him into a whirlwind of opportunities and challenges that will test his friendships, resolve, and his sense of humor. He will soon discover that success comes with its own set of comedic twists and turns!

programme.title: Priceless: The Score
programme.desc: After starting their new record label, Donica Blair and Shequell Harris have entered a dangerous arena full of guns, lies, and deceit. Now they are racing against time to right their wrongs and save their own lives before they are next in a string of murders. Meanwhile their partner Seven, has fallen victim to the deadliest of them all; the Black widow.

programme.title: Runway of Shadows
programme.desc: Sisters Ivy and Zara are separated at a very young age due to their father’s deceit. When Ivy and Zara unexpectedly cross paths at a prestigious runway show, the stage it set for a series of mysterious and unsettling events.

programme.title: The Devil Came to Duval
programme.desc: After surviving a suicide attempt, comedian Eli Thompson faces his past on his birthday, but a night out at the bar spirals into chaos when the Devil arrives. Eli must confront betrayal, revenge, and supernatural terror to survive.

programme.title: The Jealous Son
programme.desc: Seduced by her boyfriend's charming son, a woman soon finds herself trapped in a dangerous obsession that will push her to her limits.

programme.title: Kiss Me Once
programme.desc: Gabrielle, a delusional romantic, fixates on anyone who shows her the slightest interest. Her obsession turns dangerous when her feelings aren't reciprocated.
